title: Google Pixel 4 heating up
content:
I am noticing my Pixel 4 heating up rapidly when I use the camera.  I have an application where I need to take a set of 100 or so photos in quick time (say 5 min) and I can see a temp rise of almost 10 deg C during this time.  I am noticing a similar situation after just a min or so of shooting video.  It's getting to the point of not being usable.  

I would love to hear if anyone else has experienced similar issues or if there is a workaround.  

Thanks.
